public ref class DesignerView : System::Windows::Controls::UserControl, System::Windows::Markup::IComponentConnector, System::Windows::Markup::IStyleConnector

summary.span: 为表示工作流画布的设计器视图提供 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 控件。

span.span: Provides Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) controls for the designer view that represents the workflow canvas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 和 接口，以便为指定的 XAML 元素以及将事件处理程序附加到这些元素提供支持。Implements the and interfaces to provide support for named XAML elements and for attaching event handlers to them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按住 CTRL 或 SHIFT 键并选择多个元素时，这是`true`。If you hold down the CTRL or SHIFT key and select more than one element, this is `true`. 如果只选择一个元素，这是`false`。If only one element is selected, this is `false`.

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 PreviewMouseWheel 事件。

span.span: Raises the PreviewMouseWheel event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当某个未处理的 附加事件在其路由中到达派生自此类的某个元素时，调用此事件。This event is invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class. 重写此方法可为此事件添加类处理。Override this method to add class handling for this event. 如果在处理此事件时按住 Ctrl 键，将根据鼠标滚轮的移动，放大或缩小此视图。If the CTRL key is pressed when this event is processed, the view is zoomed in or out, based on the movement of the mouse wheel.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnReferenceUpdated (System.Reflection.AssemblyName updatedReference, bool isAdded);
.method public hidebysig instance void OnReferenceUpdated(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName updatedReference, bool isAdded) cil managed
Public Sub OnReferenceUpdated (updatedReference As AssemblyName, isAdded As Boolean)

param.name: updatedReference
param.span: 添加或移除的被引用程序集。

span.span: The referenced assembly that is added or removed.

param.name: isAdded
param.span: 如果添加了程序集引用，则为 ；如果移除了程序集引用，则为 。

span.span: if the assembly reference is added; if the assembly reference is removed.

summary.span: 根据是添加还是移除了指定的被引用程序集，刷新导入的命名空间的列表。

span.span: Refreshes the list of imported namespaces based on whether the specified referenced assembly is added or removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果添加了被引用程序集，则具有在该程序集中找到的类型的命名空间将添加到所导入的命名空间中。If the referenced assembly is added, the namespaces of the types found in the assembly are added to the list of imported namespaces. 如果删除了被引用程序集，则具有在该程序集中找到的类型的命名空间将从所导入的命名空间中移除。If the referenced assembly is removed, the namespaces of the types found in the assembly are removed from the list of imported namespaces.
